name: ContentPlaybackFailureRequest
desc: A request the client sends to recover from failed content playback.

items.name: constraints
items.desc: Limitations on the type and quantity of content to provide in the recovery Queue.

items.name: contentFailure
items.desc: An object that describes why playback failed.

items.name: nextContentUrl
items.desc: The URL the client uses to request the next queue segment.

items.name: previousContentUrl
items.desc: The URL the client uses to request the previous queue segment.

items.name: sessionIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier that associates the requests and  responses of a specific intent.

items.name: timestamp
items.desc: The time when the playback failure occurred.

items.name: userActivity
items.desc: A description of the client’s current playback queue.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the client’s SiriKitMediaAPI library.

items.name: whilePlaying
items.desc: The content that failed to play.
